question: Hi
answer: Hello, Welcome to Silverzone ERP Help

question: How to register for Olympiad?
answer: Go to ERP > Registration > Select student and subjects.

question: When will books be delivered?
answer: Books are usually delivered within 7–10 working days after payment.

question: What is the last date for Olympiad registration?
answer: The last date for Olympiad registration is usually 30–40 days before the exam. Check the ERP or official circular.

question: How to download admit card?
answer: Admit cards can be downloaded from ERP > Admit Card section before the exam date.

question: What are the exam modes available?
answer: Silverzone Olympiads are conducted in both Online and Offline (pen-paper) modes depending on the subject and school preference.

question: How to contact Silverzone support?
answer: You can email at info@silverzone.org or call 011–69114100 (Mon–Fri, 10 AM–5 PM).

question: Are Olympiad books available for all subjects?
answer: Yes, preparatory books are available for all Olympiad subjects and levels.

question: When are Olympiad results declared?
answer: Results are declared approximately 30–45 days after the exam date. They are uploaded in the ERP.

question: How to correct student details after registration?
answer: Corrections can be requested via email or updated in ERP before final confirmation.

question: Where can I find syllabus for the Olympiad?
answer: Syllabus is available in the ERP and also on the official website under each subject section.

question: How are Olympiad ranks calculated?
answer: Ranks are calculated based on marks obtained, time taken, and tie-breaking logic set by Silverzone.

question: When will certificates be issued?
answer: Participation and merit certificates are uploaded in ERP within 45 days of result declaration.

question: When will be the exam?
answer: Exams will be in the month of November/ December, please check the tentative dates at https://www.silverzone.org/olympiadsdates
